data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 235,500 citizens of Lori, Armenia, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lori, Armenia

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 21,617 believers in Lori to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 10 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Lori, Armenia to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Lori, Armenia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Vanadzor
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Vanadzor, Lori, Armenia.
Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Lori, Armenia.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: God, guide the 21,617 believers in Lori to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.

data.section_summary:
the state of Lori, Armenia has a population of 235,500.

We estimate Lori has 21,617 people who might know Jesus, 196,133 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 17,751 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 10 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Lori, Armenia.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."
